content: > shop kits with noro silk garden solo and bon tricot bliss mohair 1 a simple knitted set to keep you ultra-toasty through the frosty months the winter s watch hat and mittens work up quickly in feisty fibres pure canadian worsted grown spun and hand-dyed in canada we love the springy texture and surprising softness of this 100% wool yarn the hat is designed to fit close to the head with minimal slouch for maximum insulation and cosiness the mittens feature a tailored thumb gusset for a snug fit we knit our second hat sample in noro silk garden solo held with mohair **yarn** feisty fibres pure canadian 100% canadian wool 240 yds / 220 m per 100g - 2 skeins for hat and glove set shown in dirty martini noro silk garden solo 45% silk / 45% mohair / 10% wool 110 yds / 100 m per 50g - 3 balls shown in 001 held with bon tricot bliss mohair 64% mohair / 36% silk 459 yds / 420 m per 50g - 1 skein shown in summer peach set requires approx 300 yd / 275 m of aran-weight yarn in total 162yd / 169m for the hat 136yd / 125m for the mittens calculated for the largest size with minimal yardage difference between sizes **hat sizes 1 2 3 ** circumference 16 17 5 19 / 40 5 44 5 48 cm height 11 5 12 13 5 / 29 30 5 34 approx pick a size 3 5 / 8 13 cm smaller than your head circumference **mittens sizes 1 2 3 ** circumference 6 5 7 25 8 / 16 18 20 cm length 9 9 5 10 / 23 24 5 26 cm approx 1 https //www espacetricot com/us/winters-watch-hat-kit html
